attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to ensure there are only two possible penalties for people convicted of terrorist offences, DEPORTATION or DEATH.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Middle Eastern citizens who are also terrorists are using our ludicrous Human Rights Act against us and this has to be stopped.  If a dangerous individual cannot be deported because there is a threat in his home country the the only possible other option MUST be execution.  These people are far too dangerous to be kept alive in a country where the political classes have to inclination to keeping them under control.  If there is any doubt in the minds of our political leaders as to how the people feel about paying to keep these animals in a life of luxury then we should have an immediate referendum.
